# ods-input-text



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute      | Description                                                                                                                                                   | Type                                                                                                                                                 | Default     |
| -------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `autocomplete` | `autocomplete` | Specifies for enabling or disabling of autocomplete in <input> element                                                                                        | `"off" \| "on"`                                                                                                                                      | `undefined` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`     | Disables the input control                                                                                                                                    | `boolean`                                                                                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `invalid`      | `invalid`      | Specifies the the validity of the element value.                                                                                                              | `boolean`                                                                                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `label`        | `label`        | Assigns a name to the input control.                                                                                                                          | `string`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `max`          | `max`          | Specifies the maximum permissible value, this is used in types date, month, week, time and datetime-local only.                                               | `number`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `maxlength`    | `maxlength`    | Specifies the maximum amount of characters permissible in the input element.                                                                                  | `number`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `min`          | `min`          | Specifies the minimum permissible value, this is used in types date, month, week, time and datetime-local only.                                               | `string`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `minlength`    | `minlength`    | Specifies the minimum amount of characters permissible in the input element.                                                                                  | `number`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `name`         | `name`         | Assigns a name to the input control.                                                                                                                          | `string`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `placeholder`  | `placeholder`  | Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value.                                                                                                     | `string`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `readonly`     | `readonly`     | Sets the input control value to read-only. This prevents the user from changing the value, however unlike disabled the element can continue to recieve focus. | `string`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `required`     | `required`     | Specifies that an input field must be filled out before submitting the form                                                                                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `type`         | `type`         | Specifies the type of control.                                                                                                                                | `"button" \| "date" \| "datetime-local" \| "email" \| "month" \| "number" \| "password" \| "search" \| "tel" \| "text" \| "time" \| "url" \| "week"` | `undefined` |
| `value`        | `value`        | Specifies the intial value for the control.                                                                                                                   | `string`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description | Type               |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `ods-input` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
